sub_title: Area Sales Manager at Bridge Polymers BV
summary:
INTRODUCTION:
Bertrand is Cameroonian of origin and lives in the Netherlands. Coming from a country with cultural diversity, I am always open for new challenges.

Bertrand is interested in the fields of marketing/sales as well as Logistics and has always found pleasure working in the above mentioned areas. 

Hobbies:  fitness, motocross, football and others.

 TV : National geography, investigation discovery, discovery channel, CNN,BBC, just to name these.
